wikipedia_page.main:
Kyle Bibb (born (1987-01-25)25 January 1987) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who last played for the Doncaster RLFC in the Championship, as a prop.
He previously played in the Super League for Hull FC, Wakefield Trinity Wildcats (Heritage № 1262), the Hull Kingston Rovers and the Harlequins RL,  Bibb joined the Wakefield Trinity Wildcats after a season in the second team at Hull F.C. making many first team appearances throughout the 2009 season. He was on loaned to Harlequins RL but was recalled by Wakefield Trinity Wildcats. In September 2010 Kyle Bibb signed for Championship One side the Dewsbury Rams.

response: * Kyle Bibb (born 1988), English rugby league player
